MacStadium - Atlanta, GA - Onsite

Network Engineer / Systems Engineer - Linux/ OSX/Windows/VMware/Cisco

You will be working with the operations team at MacStadium.​com to deploy server and network hardware in a data-center environment.​ You will also support customers as a Tier 2 engineer with more advanced support incidents.​

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

Configure and deploy network infrastructure as required.​ Configure and stage code Rack & Stack Test & Deploy

Configure and deploy server infrastructure as required.​ Apple Mac, HP Blades, and SAN.​

   - Install RAM, SSD's, HDD's
   - Mass-deploy servers via imaging processes
Respond to Tier 2 customer support issues via ticket, chat, telephone for issues which typically encompass:

   - Network configuration issues (TCP/​IP)
   - Network infrastructure issues (cabling, switch ports, etc)
   - Adjusting firewall configurations
   - Bad hardware (bad optics, server components, etc)
Own and Escalate issues as required.​

Application: http://jobview.local-jobs.monster.com//Network-Engineer-Syst...
